Detailed Description

An example for legal vertex format.

Use XFCGL_LVERTEX as vertex format flags. XFCGL_LVERTEX is defined as (XFCGLVF_XYZ | XFCGLVF_DIFFUSECOLOR | XFCGLVF_TEXTURE1).

See also:
XFCGL_LVERTEX
